attributes.action: Increase the State Pension by 9% immediately and 6% in 2009 in line with the Shell Tanker Drivers Award
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is evident that Pensioners are now going to seriously fall behind with their ability to pay for food, heating and general cost of living.   If Shell Tanker Drivers are worth 14% over two years, then Pensioners should be treated equally.
